content.rendered:
Monday, December 9, 2024
Today is an “A” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Bagpiping Club will meet on Monday right after dismissal in P222.
  • A Hand Up Club will meet Monday, December 9th in room 278. Please join us for a snack and help wrap our Adopt a Senior gifts.
  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we will be meeting after school in the Large Group Room on Wednesday, December 11. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. See you there!
  • No Place for Hate will meet on Wednesday 12/11 in room 257.
  • To prepare for our competition in February, Math Club will be meeting every Wednesday after school in Room R232. All students grades 6-8 are welcome.
  • Any student interested in joining the Jazz Band Club should get information from Mr. Doyle in B106. Students MUST be in grades 7 or 8, already play an instrument, and be able to read music. Rehearsals will begin in January, and will not conflict with Ski Club.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
